name: Jalen
appearance: Sun-leathered skin, dune scarf, sand-etched compass and saffron windburn lines at the cheeks.
character: Wry and stoic; measures people by how they travel.
talents: hears the Titan's hum to predict storms
sets singing tents that deter raiders
dreams: buy a glass-walled garden at an oasis
end the mirage-bandits terrorizing saffron trains
map a safe night route straight to Thyssara
secrets: once guided smugglers through a warded dune for coin
buried a bright runecap near the Skybridge ruins
owes Daru a favor that grows with interest
